text: Ramadan is not just about hunger; it is about cleansing the heart.
Every sunset in Ramadan is a reminder that Allah kept His promise.
Ramadan trains the body, but transforms the soul.
The nights of Ramadan are written with mercy.
A single sincere dua in Ramadan can change your destiny.
Iman grows when the heart remembers Allah often.
Faith is built quietly, in moments no one else sees.
The strongest heart is the one attached to Allah.
When Iman increases, fear decreases.
A heart filled with Allah has no room for despair.
Seeking knowledge is a form of worship.
The Quran is light for the one who reflects.
Ilm without humility benefits no one.
The more you learn about Allah, the more you love Him.
Every letter of the Quran carries reward.
Small consistent deeds are beloved to Allah.
Sujood is where the believer finds peace.
Your secret prayers are known to Allah.
Worship is not a burden; it is a privilege.
When you stand for prayer, you stand before your Creator.
